p: Previous combined STM/AFM experiments show a strong distortion of the O 2 c site above the vacancy which is lifted up by 0.3 Å (Stetsovych et al., 2015). PP–PW (PBE+U) and AE–LCAO (B3LYP) support this result with the O 2 c moving up by 0.28 and 0.31 Å, respectively. AE–LCAO (HSE) reproduces this trend with a normal displacement of 0.38 Å, identical to the PP–PW–PBE+U result.
